MemberSignature.Value: public static void Migrate (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.DatabaseFacade databaseFacade);
.method public static hidebysig void Migrate(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.DatabaseFacade databaseFacade) cil managed

summary.para: Applies any pending migrations for the context to the database. Will create the database if it does not already exist.

Note that this API is mutually exclusive with DbContext.Database.EnsureCreated(). EnsureCreated does not use migrations to create the database and therefore the database that is created cannot be later updated using migrations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task MigrateAsync (this Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.DatabaseFacade databaseFacade, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task MigrateAsync(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.DatabaseFacade databaseFacade, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: A to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

summary.para: Asynchronously applies any pending migrations for the context to the database. Will create the database if it does not already exist.

Note that this API is mutually exclusive with DbContext.Database.EnsureCreated(). EnsureCreated does not use migrations to create the database and therefore the database that is created cannot be later updated using migrations.

Docs.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous migration operation.
